description:
The Empire crosses the border and begins its invasion of North Ambria, which focuses its defenses around Haliask and decides to fight an all-out defensive battle. Lavi, convinced of the presence of manipulators behind the scenes, heads to the palace to talk to Rogan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le chevalier divin atterrit dans les cendres
The Divine Knight Arrives at the Gray
騎神, 鈍色へ降り立つ
